concept.title: Strategic Plan
concept.shortdesc: The University Strategic Plan is meant to set forth a plan of action for Virginia Tech to follows in the years to come. The current plan is entitled A Plan For A New Horizon and encompasses 2012-2018.

conbody.p: The Strategic Plan for 2012-2018 has an emphasis on improving technology, research, and other STEM professions, and preparing students for these roles. Within the strategic plan, however, is a focus on inclusion and acceptance of diversity, central to InclusiveVT.
Highlights from the Strategic Plan include:

ul.li: Research experiences in culture in new and provocative ways
Include a diverse and inclusive range of perspectives and resources into courses
Consider the unique needs of nontraditional students and veterans
Understand that we cannot meet our motto (That I May Serve) without honoring diversity
Value the unique contributions of each member of the Virginia Tech community
